short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Allows you to view other players statuses within the Roblox website

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Earlier this year, Roblox has completely removed viewing Roblox players statuses. With this extension, you will be able to view other players statuses once again within the Roblox website.
